New Records: Shohei Ohtani became the first major league player to hit 50 home runs and steal 50 bases in a season.
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit his 50th homer in the seventh inning, an opposite-field, two-run shot to left against Marlins reliever Mike Baumann.
Shohei Ohtani hit his 49th homer in the sixth inning, launching a 1-1 slider from George Soriano 438 feet to the second deck in right-center.
Shohei Ohtani stole his 50th base in the first inning and his 51st in the second inning.
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Dave Roberts noticed Ohtani getting more aggressive on the bases in the second half of the season.
Dave Roberts mentioned that Ohtani likes the challenge of studying pitchers and learning their tendencies.
